headline.main: How to Enjoy a Low-Cholesterol Diet; Never Say 'Never'

docs.abstract: J Hewitt rev of books by Dr G Christakis and C Cutler dealing with cholesterol contents in foods
docs.lead_paragraph: " Above all," Dr. George Christakis said, "eating is, and should be fun." And there's no reason to sacrifice the fun part of it, he insisted, simply because of the coronary threat that high cholesterol levels in many foods represents.
docs.snippet: " Above all," Dr. George Christakis said, "eating is, and should be fun." And there's no reason to sacrifice the fun part of it, he insisted, simply because of the coronary threat that high cholesterol levels in many foods represents.
